actions.name: Hydration
actions.description: Effect: While Rainy Weather is active, Major Status Afflictions affecting the user tick down by 2 every Activation instead of 1. The user is considered Water Type for the effects of Rainy Weather.

system.description: Effect: While Rainy Weather is active, Major Status Afflictions affecting the user tick down by 2 every Activation instead of 1. The user is considered Water Type for the effects of Rainy Weather.
